review: I am so glad and fortunate to find Dr.Archana M, my son was suffering from  high grade fever since 9 days , we came under her care and got admitted, and he was better witin 2 days, constant follow -up from her  team, her care and diagnosis made our son back to normal , and now we are leaving hospital all happy and relieved. I strongly recommend Dr. Archana M, I wish her boundless success and happiness. Thank you

My daughter had allergy and rashes so went to hospital. ********* *** **** ** ******* I can definitely recommend doctor to my family or friends. There was no waiting time in the hospital when we went. Doctor was friendly and calamine lotion was suggested.

Admitted my 1.7 year old kid for doing some tests  , there was no good approach from hospital staffs, even doctor not shown any interest or responsibility . Simply wasted time and money , later we got all the tests done from outside with easy & almost 5 to 10 times lesser amount .
